title: Choa Chu Kang Park Playground and Play Features
blurb: Pyramid climbing net and train-themed play structures.
description: Choa Chu Kang Park offers a variety of play areas suitable for children of different ages. Older children can enjoy the challenging pyramid climbing net, while younger ones can explore train-themed structures and other imaginative play features. The park provides a fun and engaging environment for kids to develop their psychomotor and social skills through active play. Families can spend quality time together in this green space, enjoying the fresh air and natural surroundings. The park is designed to encourage physical activity and creativity, making it a great destination for a family outing. With its diverse play options, Choa Chu Kang Park ensures that children have a memorable and enjoyable experience.

title: Water Play Areas for a Splashing Good Time
blurb: Cool off from a hot day at our water play areas.

These water play areas are a great way to beat the heat and have a memorable day out with the family.

title: Child-Friendly Activities at National Parks Board
blurb: Classes to learn skating, horse riding, and more.
description: Discover a variety of child-friendly activities and classes offered by the National Parks Board. Engage in activities such as skating, horse riding, and sandcastle building to develop new skills. Explore nature-related activities to learn about Singapore's biodiversity and heritage. Visit the National Orchid Garden at the Botanic Gardens and introduce your family to the history of Vanda Miss Joaquim, our national flower. Learn about trees in Singapore and find more learning resources related to parks and nature. Perfect for families looking to spend quality time outdoors and learn about the environment.

title: National Parks Board’s Community in Nature (CIN)
blurb: Learn about Singapore's biodiversity with the family.
description: Rally the family to learn about Singapore's biodiversity through the National Parks Board’s Community in Nature (CIN) programme. This program offers various activities and resources to help families discover and appreciate the natural heritage of Singapore. Explore different ecosystems, learn about native flora and fauna, and participate in conservation efforts. Perfect for families who enjoy outdoor adventures and want to deepen their understanding of the environment. Activities are designed to be engaging and educational for all ages, fostering a love for nature and promoting environmental stewardship.
datetime_display: friendly nature activities to discover more about biodiversity and heritage in Singapore

title: National Orchid Garden at the Botanic Gardens
blurb: Introduce your family to Singapore's national flower.
description: Visit the National Orchid Garden at the Botanic Gardens and introduce your family to the history of Vanda Miss Joaquim, our national flower. Explore the vibrant displays of orchids from around the world, learn about their unique characteristics, and discover the fascinating story behind Singapore's national flower. The garden offers a serene and educational experience for families, with interactive exhibits and guided tours available. Perfect for families who appreciate natural beauty and want to learn more about the diverse world of orchids. Enjoy a leisurely stroll through the garden and immerse yourselves in the sights and scents of these exquisite flowers.
datetime_display: friendly nature activities to discover more about biodiversity and heritage in Singapore
